title: Understanding KYC
lead: What is KYC and why you should avoid it.
description: Know Your Customer (KYC) is the practice of verifying the identity of clients. You should place a high priority on privacy, and avoid buying bitcoin that requires KYC, as it means your identity is tied to your purchases and to the wallet addresses where that bitcoin is kept. Data leaks, which happen often, can put you and your bitcoin at risk.
